descriptionHtml:
Star-101BugsRebalance
By: Star-Demon
==============================
Current Version: 1.1
====================

///Installation:///
Unpack to /Data

///Basic:///

I really love 101Bugs by 83Willow (Found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4955/) but I've noticed the amount of gold they add to the economy through Overpowered alchemy products is insane. Alchemy has always been a quick moneymaker in TES and I thought it was high time to take this mod down a notch for personal use, and I thought I'd share my patch.

What this mod does:
- Price for alchemy potions is mostly determined by magnitude - so I've taken the magnitude of all effects on 83Willow's ingredients down by roughly half. Most 30's became 15s, 15s became 6 or 7s, 20s became 10s, 5s became 3s, and pretty much like that.

- Most bugs still retain their alchemical personality, but I'm open to suggestions and changes.

Requires:
83Willows 101BugsHD Butterfly Dragonfly Luna-Moth Torchbug
(Found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4955/)

Compatibility:
Yes: Vanilla

//Version History///

1.1:
Properly added Master dependency to willow's mod.

1.0:
Initial version. Adjustments made.

///Credits:///

Bethsoft for the game and makers for thier stuff and contributions to the community.

83Willow for 101BugsHD.
author: Star-Demon
